bibl.title: Callimachus' Book of Iambi. (Oxford Classical Monographs.)
bibl.seg: KERKHECKER Arnd, Callimachus' Book of Iambi. (Oxford Classical Monographs.)
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1999, 8°, xxiv-334 pp. ISBN 0-19-924006-X. £50.

C.R. par Daniel Donnet, EtCl 69 (2001) p. 325. - Frederick T. Griffiths, AJP 122 (2001) pp. 440-444. - Richard Hunter, CR N.S., 50 (2000) pp. 412-414. - James Clauss, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2001/2001-07-12.html >. - Dee L. Clayman, CW 95 (2001-2002) pp. 193-194. - Annette Harder, Gnomon 75 (2003) pp. 584-590. - Mary Depew, JHS 123 (2003) pp. 210-211.
